Welcome

Jun 27, 2015 â€¢ Jamie Pilgrim

Hellllllloooo World! The web would not exist without coding or cats. It only makes sense that the two join forces to make sense of it all. Inspired by my first teaching gig, I've started this blog as yet another resource to help guide beginning to intermediate coders navigate through the craziness of code. Also, it's another excuse to show off my cats.

The code behind the Cats
